languages.text: Winterscale gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and +40 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} but becomes uncontrollable until the end of combat. Uncontrollable: the creature always tries to attack the nearest target. ! Can only be used with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon in hand.
languages.original_text: Винтерскейл получает +20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} и +40 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}, но до конца боя становится неуправляемым. Неуправляемость: существо всегда пытается атаковать ближайшую цель. ! Может использоваться только при наличии {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}рукопашного{/g} оружия.

traits.locale_text: Winterscale gains +20 Weapon Skill and +40 Strength but becomes uncontrollable until the end of combat. Uncontrollable: the creature always tries to attack the nearest target. ! Can only be used with a melee weapon in hand.

Winterscale gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and +40 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} but becomes uncontrollable until the end of combat. Uncontrollable: the creature always tries to attack the nearest target. ! Can only be used with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon in hand.

languages.text: Winterscale gana +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y +40 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} pero se vuelve incontrolable hasta el final del combate. Incontrolable: la criatura siempre intenta atacar al objetivo más cercano. ! Solo puede usarse con un arma {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} en la mano.
languages.original_text: Winterscale gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and +40 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} but becomes uncontrollable until the end of combat. Uncontrollable: the creature always tries to attack the nearest target. ! Can only be used with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon in hand.

traits.locale_text: Winterscale gana +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y +40 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} pero se vuelve incontrolable hasta el final del combate. Incontrolable: la criatura siempre intenta atacar al objetivo más cercano. ! Solo puede usarse con un arma cuerpo a cuerpo en la mano.

languages.text: 温特斯凯尔获得+20{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}与+40{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}，但会变得无法控制，效果持续至战斗结束。 不受控制：此生物始终会攻击距离最近的目标。 ！在此状态下，只能使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器。
languages.original_text: Winterscale gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and +40 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} but becomes uncontrollable until the end of combat. Uncontrollable: the creature always tries to attack the nearest target. ! Can only be used with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon in hand.

traits.locale_text: 温特斯凯尔获得+20{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}与+40{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}，但会变得无法控制，效果持续至战斗结束。 不受控制：此生物始终会攻击距离最近的目标。 ！在此状态下，只能使用近战武器。

languages.text: Winterscale bénéficie de +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de Combat{/g} et de +40 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} mais devient incontrôlable jusqu'à la fin du combat. Incontrôlable : la créature essaie toujours d'attaquer la cible la plus proche. ! Uniquement utilisable avec une arme de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} en main.
languages.original_text: Winterscale gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and +40 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} but becomes uncontrollable until the end of combat. Uncontrollable: the creature always tries to attack the nearest target. ! Can only be used with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon in hand.

traits.locale_text: Winterscale bénéficie de +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'Arme{/g} et de +40 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} mais devient incontrôlable jusqu'à la fin du combat. Incontrôlable : la créature essaie toujours d'attaquer la cible la plus proche. ! Uniquement utilisable avec une arme de mêlée en main.

languages.text: Winterzunder erlangt bis zum Ende des Kampfes +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfertigkeit{/g} und +40 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}, wird aber unkontrollierbar. Unkontrollierbar: Die Kreatur versucht stets, das nächstgelegene Ziel anzugreifen. ! Kann nur mit ausgerüsteter {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfwaffe{/g} eingesetzt werden.
languages.original_text: Winterscale gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and +40 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} but becomes uncontrollable until the end of combat. Uncontrollable: the creature always tries to attack the nearest target. ! Can only be used with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon in hand.

traits.locale_text: Winterzunder erlangt bis zum Ende des Kampfes +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfertigkeit{/g} und +40 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}, wird aber unkontrollierbar. Unkontrollierbar: Die Kreatur versucht stets, das nächstgelegene Ziel anzugreifen. ! Kann nur mit ausgerüsteter Nahkampfwaffe eingesetzt werden.

languages.text: ウィンタースケールは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g} +20と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g} +40を獲得するが、戦闘終了時まで制御不能となる。 制御不能：生物は、最も近くにいるターゲットを常に攻撃しようとする。 !{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}武器を手にしている場合のみ利用できる。
languages.original_text: Winterscale gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and +40 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} but becomes uncontrollable until the end of combat. Uncontrollable: the creature always tries to attack the nearest target. ! Can only be used with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon in hand.

traits.locale_text: ウィンタースケールは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g} +20と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g} +40を獲得するが、戦闘終了時まで制御不能となる。 制御不能：生物は、最も近くにいるターゲットを常に攻撃しようとする。 !近接武器を手にしている場合のみ利用できる。

Неуправляемость: существо всегда пытается атаковать ближайшую цель. ! Может использоваться только при наличии {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}рукопашного{/g} оружия.

Uncontrollable: the creature always tries to attack the nearest target. ! Can only be used with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon in hand.

Неуправляемость: существо всегда пытается атаковать ближайшую цель. ! Может использоваться только при наличии рукопашного оружия.
